# Default crawlers - allow all
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://spec-weave.com/sitemap.xml

# Disallow non-public content
Disallow: /DOCUMENTATION-AUDIT
Disallow: /*_archive*/
Disallow: /*internal*/

# Rate limiting for aggressive AI bots
User-agent: GPTBot
Crawl-delay: 10

User-agent: CCBot
Crawl-delay: 10

User-agent: Claude-Web
Crawl-delay: 10

Crawl-delay: 10
